wikipedia_page.main: Paul O'Brien   (22 January 1954 – 16 October 2018) was professor of Inorganic Materials at the University of Manchester. where he has served as head of the School of Chemistry from 2004 to 2009 and head of the School of Materials from 2011 to 2015. He died on 16 October 2018 at the age of 64.

link_mentions.page: Department of Materials, University of Manchester
response: the head of department is Professor Sarah Cartmell. From 2011 to 2015 the head of School was Professor Paul O'Brien FRS.  Other senior academic staff include Philip J. Withers FRS, the Regius Professor of Materials and Sarah Haigh .

response: * Paul O'Brien CBE FRS (b 1954), Professor of Chemistry at the University of Manchester
Paul O'Brien (born 1978) is an Australian actor.
Paul O'Brien may also refer to:
* Paul O'Brien (rugby league), Australian rugby league footballer of the 1970s
* Paul O'Brien (Australian footballer, born 1950), VFL footballer for Carlton
* Paul O'Brien (Australian footballer, born 1961), VFL footballer for Essendon and Melbourne
* Paul O'Brien (Australian footballer, born 1948), VFL footballer for Fitzroy
* Paul O'Brien (scholar), Irish language scholar and Catholic priest
